title: # 292 - Nate Bargatze, Kyle Kinane, & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with Nate Bargatze and Kyle Kinane to talk about Netflix specials, Kyle being the voice of Comedy Central, comedy on the road, running from cops, and much more!

Catch Me, Sal Vulcano, Nate Bargatze, and Kyle Kinane on the tour tour!
https://www.ticketmaster.com/Bert-Kreischer-Sal-Vulcano-Nate-Bargatze-tickets/artist/2490399

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $125 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcasted

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH
click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
